languages.text: {n}Схватив один из обрезанных кабелей, вы бестрепетно прижимаете его к телу техножреца. Удар чудовищной силы оглушает и вас, и одержимого, и Паскаля. Голос кривляющегося схизматикаля становится громче и злее. Раскалившиеся под кожей аугменты прожигают ее насквозь, и на бледной плоти проступают богохульные знаки.{/n}

{n}Undaunted, you grab one of the severed cables and press it into the Tech-Priest's body. A shock of formidable power stuns you, the possessed man, and Pasqal. The schismatical's mocking voice grows louder and more malicious. The augmetics under the Tech-Priest's skin become so hot they burn right through it, and blasphemous symbols appear upon his pale flesh.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Схватив один из обрезанных кабелей, вы бестрепетно прижимаете его к телу техножреца. Удар чудовищной силы оглушает и вас, и одержимого, и Паскаля. Голос кривляющегося схизматикаля становится громче и злее. Раскалившиеся под кожей аугменты прожигают ее насквозь, и на бледной плоти проступают богохульные знаки.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unbeeindruckt packst du eines der abgetrennten Kabel und drückst es in den Körper des Techpriesters. Ein gewaltiger Schock durchführt dich, den Besessenen und Pasqal. Die spöttische Stimme des Abtrünnigen wird lauter und boshafter. Die Augmentationen unter der Haut des Techpriesters erhitzen sich derart, dass sie die Haut durchbrennen. Blasphemische Symbole erscheinen auf seinem blassen Fleisch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, you grab one of the severed cables and press it into the Tech-Priest's body. A shock of formidable power stuns you, the possessed man, and Pasqal. The schismatical's mocking voice grows louder and more malicious. The augmetics under the Tech-Priest's skin become so hot they burn right through it, and blasphemous symbols appear upon his pale flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unbeeindruckt packst du eines der abgetrennten Kabel und drückst es in den Körper des Techpriesters. Ein gewaltiger Schock durchführt dich, den Besessenen und Pasqal. Die spöttische Stimme des Abtrünnigen wird lauter und boshafter. Die Augmentationen unter der Haut des Techpriesters erhitzen sich derart, dass sie die Haut durchbrennen. Blasphemische Symbole erscheinen auf seinem blassen Fleisch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Imperturbable, vous saisissez l'un des câbles coupés et le mettez en contact avec le corps du technoprêtre. Un choc électrique d'une puissance phénoménale vous étourdit vous, l'homme possédé et Pasqal. La voix sarcastique du schismatique se fait plus forte et plus malveillante. Les augmétiques sous la peau du technoprêtre se mettent à chauffer tellement qu'ils la brûlent, laissant apparaître des symboles blasphématoires sur ses chairs pâles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, you grab one of the severed cables and press it into the Tech-Priest's body. A shock of formidable power stuns you, the possessed man, and Pasqal. The schismatical's mocking voice grows louder and more malicious. The augmetics under the Tech-Priest's skin become so hot they burn right through it, and blasphemous symbols appear upon his pale flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Imperturbable, vous saisissez l'un des câbles coupés et le mettez en contact avec le corps du technoprêtre. Un choc électrique d'une puissance phénoménale vous étourdit vous, l'homme possédé et Pasqal. La voix sarcastique du schismatique se fait plus forte et plus malveillante. Les augmétiques sous la peau du technoprêtre se mettent à chauffer tellement qu'ils la brûlent, laissant apparaître des symboles blasphématoires sur ses chairs pâles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你毫不畏惧地抓住一根被切断的电缆，将它刺入技术神甫的身体里。一股强大的力量将你、技术神甫、帕斯卡三人震了个趔趄。分离者的嘲笑声越来越响亮，越来越恶毒。技术技术皮下的植入物变得越来越烫，灼伤了他的皮肤，他苍白的皮肤上也开始浮现出亵渎的印记。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, you grab one of the severed cables and press it into the Tech-Priest's body. A shock of formidable power stuns you, the possessed man, and Pasqal. The schismatical's mocking voice grows louder and more malicious. The augmetics under the Tech-Priest's skin become so hot they burn right through it, and blasphemous symbols appear upon his pale flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你毫不畏惧地抓住一根被切断的电缆，将它刺入技术祭司的身体里。一股强大的力量将你、技术祭司、帕斯卡三人震了个趔趄。分离者的嘲笑声越来越响亮，越来越恶毒。技术技术皮下的植入物变得越来越烫，灼伤了他的皮肤，他苍白的皮肤上也开始浮现出亵渎的印记。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ひるむことなく切断されたケーブルのひとつを掴んで技術司祭の体に押し込む。激しい力の衝撃で、あなたもはりつけになっていた男もパスカルも動けなくなった。分離派の嘲笑うような声は、どんどん大きくなって邪悪さを増していく。技術司祭の皮膚の下のオーグメティックはひどく熱を持って肌を燃やし、冒涜的なシンボルをその青白い肉体に現した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, you grab one of the severed cables and press it into the Tech-Priest's body. A shock of formidable power stuns you, the possessed man, and Pasqal. The schismatical's mocking voice grows louder and more malicious. The augmetics under the Tech-Priest's skin become so hot they burn right through it, and blasphemous symbols appear upon his pale flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ひるむことなく切断されたケーブルのひとつを掴み、それを技術司祭の体に押し込む。激しい力の衝撃で、あなたと張り付けの男、パスカルは動けなくなった。分裂の嘲笑うような声は、どんどん大きくなって邪悪さを増していく。技術司祭の皮膚の下のオーグメティックは、ひどく熱を持ち肌を燃やして、冒涜的なシンボルがその青白い肉体に現れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sin inmutarte, agarras uno de los cables cortados y lo introduces en el cuerpo del Tecnosacerdote. Una descarga de formidable poder os aturde a ti, al poseído y a Pasqal. La voz burlona del cismático se hace cada vez más fuerte y maliciosa. Los agujeros bajo la piel del Tecnosacerdote se calientan tanto que la atraviesan y aparecen símbolos blasfemos en su pálida carne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, you grab one of the severed cables and press it into the Tech-Priest's body. A shock of formidable power stuns you, the possessed man, and Pasqal. The schismatical's mocking voice grows louder and more malicious. The augmetics under the Tech-Priest's skin become so hot they burn right through it, and blasphemous symbols appear upon his pale flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin inmutarte, agarras uno de los cables cortados y lo introduces en el cuerpo del Tecnosacerdote. Una descarga de formidable poder os aturde a ti, al poseído y a Pasqal. La voz burlona del cismático se hace cada vez más fuerte y maliciosa. Los agujeros bajo la piel del Tecnosacerdote se calientan tanto que la atraviesan y aparecen símbolos blasfemos en su pálida carne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hasarlı kablolardan birini gözü pek bir şekilde kaptığın gibi Tekno Rahip'in vücuduna bastırıyorsun. Muazzam gücün şoku, seni, ele geçirilen adamı ve Pasqal'ı sersemletiyor. Bölücünün alaycı sesi gürleşirken hasmane tutumu da keskinleşiyor. Tekno Rahip'in derisinin altındaki ogmetikler o denli ısınıyor ki tenini küle çeviriyor ve soluk etindeki kâfirce semboller meydana çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Undaunted, you grab one of the severed cables and press it into the Tech-Priest's body. A shock of formidable power stuns you, the possessed man, and Pasqal. The schismatical's mocking voice grows louder and more malicious. The augmetics under the Tech-Priest's skin become so hot they burn right through it, and blasphemous symbols appear upon his pale flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hasarlı kablolardan birini gözü pek bir şekilde kaptığın gibi Tekno Rahip'in vücuduna bastırıyorsun. Muazzam gücün şoku, seni, ele geçirilen adamı ve Pasqal'ı sersemletiyor. Bölücünün alaycı sesi gürleşirken hasmane tutumu da keskinleşiyor. Tekno Rahip'in derisinin altındaki ogmetikler o kadar ısınıyor ki derisini yakıp geçiyor, soluk teninde kâfirliğin sembolleri beliriyor.{/n}
